name: Arrow's Theorem
description:
Arrow finds himself in need to win the elections at any cost.

But it's not as easy as it sounds. 

Find the way to keep advancing in the elections in a changing environment!

First past the post, Borda count, IRV - will you be able to master many voting methods, to find the way to keep advancing against all odds?

Everything was made solo, in a 72 hour time span.

Music&sfx with BFXR, audacity and FL studio

Art with photoshop

Based on Arrow's Theorem, Primer youtube videos, and some voting theory sources.

*WebGL version updated, since apparently rendering some objects in this build made them look a bit off, same for the UI, and the re-appearing dialog box.
